themes: decline in support for arts organizations post-Covid
artists leaving Austin due to lack of support
recommendation to model after other large cities' funding practices
key_phrases: the City of Austin has done a very good job allocating funds to organizations that support the arts in general since Covid
they have limited funds and opportunities to individuals or organization that the staff is favorable towards
more and more organizations in the city that actually provide opportunities for artist to thrive have shut down
look at large cities that fund the arts successfully and use that as an example
more and more artists are leaving Austin
We do not feel supported and opportunities are becoming more limiting
barriers_identified: closure of organizations that support artists
lack of city support for arts organizations
solutions_proposed: look at large cities that fund the arts successfully and use that as an example
